title: Just one of those things (TEFC)
creator_credit: James Burge, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Dependent Future Pt. 1”.
A film about the hopes, joys and fears of a group of mentally handicapped children and their parents. They live in Swadlincote in Derbyshire where since 1971 all mentally handicapped children have been educated in ordinary schools
